DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the abnormal blood results were first observed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Abnormal Blood Laboratory Test Result First Observed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm._A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._The outcome of a laboratory test._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Observed; discovered or determined by scientific observation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Deviating from the norm.:Blood circulating throughout the body.:The outcome of a laboratory test.

Concepts.definition: Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
The outcome of a laboratory test.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Observed; discovered or determined by scientific observation.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.
